messages.content: This internet stranger is also super proud of you! Way to go!!!
Boy what an accomplishment, so proud!
i’m so proud of you!! good job dude!! :)
You’re doing so good! We’re all so proud!
And just the “stop looking at me” was so old school. It was nice!
I met him! He graduated from my high school and came back when I was a freshman to talk to us in PE. Really nice guy.
The ending was so badass as a young kid! He wasnt even in his mech!
Thats the high life of empowerment.
[NAME] stopped napping at 18 months. We’ve been implementing quiet time since. It’s wondrous.
Your smartly worded refutation of the whole of the rest of Christendom has swayed me completely, Rome is the only true home! Hurrah! Hurrah!
ok now you are being adorable on purpose i see what youre doing
There are quite a few hideous high rises in dallas. But also some beautiful and iconic ones.
ooohhhh when he look at the camera at the end it's the cutest shit ever
He already has a baby with his girlfriend who’s gorgeous
[NAME] has been attacking the basket a lot this game,good to see.
I was about to explain that the one with 8 h's was taken until I read your username. Beautiful.
Oh wow this is good to know, it was always my go-to spicy ketchup when I make frozen fries at home.
That’s how I outfitted my team in that awesome red and black colossus armor.
It's pretty warm in Australia during this time of year.
I never thought about that. Good point. Cursed and wilted rose, unlike [NAME] rose emblem.
Try really warm water instead. It's awesome.
he was stellar the Memphis game down the stretch. honestly forgot about that
How generous :) you must really make them happy. Good on you for that
Some very fine, well developed grade school humor right there.
[NAME] was so much cuter then. Also WOW that interview is cringy
Canada is full of nice people, but has also produced some pretty gnarly serial killers, so...
Nice! I haven’t listened to them or Tool in so long. Will def be getting back into them now.
Why pay so much character and it feels so good. In the humble of 1996, the website was a skinny stoner with long hair.
Despite all the [NAME] hate in/on /Melbourne, here is a beautiful Indian song for you all
